content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: CreateSiteScript path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/cdn/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/scripts content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum create a serverless script
reqbody
cdncreatesitescriptrequest
type obj
props
name
type str
desc the serverless scripts name
code
type str
format byte
desc the base64 encoded serverless scripts contents

scripts may not be larger than 20m
paths
type str
desc the http request paths that are handled by the serverless script
required true
responses
200
cdncreatesitescriptresponse
type obj
cdnsitescript
type obj
props
id
type str
desc a serverless scripts unique identifier
stackid
type str
desc the id of the stack to which a serverless scripts site belongs
siteid
type str
desc the id of the site to which a serverless script belongs
name
type str
desc a serverless scripts name
version
type str
desc a serverless scripts version number

version numbers start at 1 and are incremented every time the script is updated
code
type str
format byte
desc base64 encoded contents of a serverless script
paths
type str
desc the url paths that incoming requests should answer with a serverless script

every serverless script needs at least one path and paths must be unique
createdat
type str
format datetime
desc the date a serverless script was created
updatedat
type str
format datetime
desc the date a serverless script was last updated
desc a serverless script

serverless scripts are hosted and executed on stackpaths edge nodes
desc the response from a request to create a new edgeengine script
title: 25_Serverless Scripting_CreateSiteScript_147.json
